snippet: The United Nations voiced concern at the deteriorating security situation as members of a rebel movement that seized power last month raided a stronghold of former President François Bozizé.
abstract: United Nations voices concern at deteriorating security situation in Central African Republic, as members of rebel movement that seized power in March 2013 carry out reprisal raid on stronghold of ousted Pres Francois Bozize.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations voiced concern at the deteriorating security situation as members of a rebel movement that seized power last month raided a stronghold of former President François Bozizé.

headline.seo: Central African Republic: Rebels Attack Stronghold of Ousted President
